dict.acceptation: 大量的；结实的，牢固的；重大的；

sent.orig: Substantial maritime action jurisdiction means jurisdiction of maritime courts over the substantial disputes of maritime cases.
sent.trans: 所谓实体海事诉讼管辖，是指海事法院对海事案件实体纠纷行使的管辖权。

sent.orig: Their data may contain substantial inaccuracies.
sent.trans: 他们的数据可能有相当大的不准确性。

sent.orig: Indeed the U.S. economy has entered a recession, many U.S. companies a substantial decline in performance.
sent.trans: 美国经济确实已经进入衰退了，很多美国企业业绩出现大幅下滑。

sent.orig: While ERP can deliver substantial benefits, ERP solutions today are not a panacea.
sent.trans: 虽然ERP能带来显著的好处，但今天的ERP解决方案不是万能的。

sent.orig: Even so, the report says the protections prediction of substantial damage by 2030 is conservative.
sent.trans: 尽管如此，报告认为在2030年前造成实质性破坏的预测还是保守的。
